sentences.sContent: The passage cited above is from a Robert Frost poem.
sentences.sCn: 以上的引文出自罗伯特•弗罗斯特的一首诗。

remMethod.val: cit (引用； 唤起) + e → 引用， 引证

words.tran: 引用，引证；[法] 传票；褒扬

trans.tranOther: to give the exact words of something that has been written, especially in order to support an opinion or prove an idea
